plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d letters.
Password must contain at least 1 letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d lowercase letters.
Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d uppercase letters.
Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d numerical digits.
Password must contain at least 1 numerical digit.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d special symbols.
Password must contain at least 1 special symbol.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d non-letter characters.
Password must contain at least 1 non-letter character.

plurals.name: lenovo_kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect %1$s PIN code, you have %2$d remaining attempts.
Incorrect %1$s PIN code, you have %2$d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: lenovo_kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect %1$s PUK code, you have %2$d remaining attempts before %1$s becomes permanently unusable.
Incorrect %1$s PUK code, you have %2$d remaining attempt before %1$s becomes permanently unusable.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempts.
Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempt before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d remaining attempts before SIM becomes permanently unusable.
Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d remaining attempt before SIM becomes permanently unusable.
